title: Season Kickoff - Week 1 Fixtures
body: All teams please check the fixtures schedule and ensure you arrive 15 minutes before your game time. Good luck to all participants!

title: Equipment Check
body: Please ensure all players have proper sporting equipment including appropriate footwear and water bottles. Safety is our priority.

title: Mid-Season Tournament
body: We're excited to announce a special mid-season tournament for Week 4. Details and fixtures to be released soon.
